entries.m_greet: Hey there...! Don't suppose you could lend me a hand? There's a pack of thugs about to corner us, and I think they're liable to kill me if I don't spill a little secret... I have the coordinates to a valuable wreck that offers thousands of credits worth in salvage money. And they want the money too.
entries.a_greet: We were partners in a salvage operation. There's thousands of credits to be made, but we don't have the coordinates of the wreck. And now, that scum is saying that the partnership is over--after we've already sunk our money and time into it? No way! We want a cut!
entries.m_yes: If you can just shoot at them a bit, get them to run away--that would be great.
entries.m_thank_combat: Well, thanks for helping out! But I'm not gonna share the secret with you either. Too many people out for a fast credit these days.
entries.a_greet_rebel: We were partners in a salvage operation. There's thousands of credits to be made, but we don't have the coordinates of the wreck. And now, that scum is saying that the partnership is over--after we've already sunk our money and time into it? No way! We want a cut!
entries.a_greet_imperial: We were partners in a salvage operation. There's thousands of credits to be made, but we don't have the coordinates of the wreck. And now, that scum is saying that the partnership is over--after we've already sunk our money and time into it? No way! We want a cut!
entries.m_maybe: Well, try talking to them when they get here. Maybe they'll see reason. But I doubt it. I didn't pick them as partners because they were the reasonable type.
entries.a_no: It's bad form to doublecross a fellow salvager. You'll regret this.
entries.a_yes: Then how about you clear on out of here?
entries.a_maybe: Well, then, see if you can get the coordinates for the wreck out of that stubborn bantha-brain.
entries.a_no_negotiate: What, you trying to jump our claim? Get out of here before we blast a nice hole in your head.
entries.m_will_negotiate: What if I offer to get them back in on it, but at a third share instead of half? After all, they're only putting up some of the money, I have to deal with smuggling the goods out of the area.
entries.m_no_negotiate: No way am I going to split the profit with these scruffy idiots.
entries.a_decline_offer: Not good enough. C'mon, gang, let's deal with this doublecrosser!
entries.a_accept_offer: A third, eh? Well, I suppose that point about smuggling is a good one. I wouldn't like to get picked up by the Empire and interrogated. Alright, we accept.
entries.m_negotiate_greet: So, did they go for the offer?
entries.response_negotiate: Are you willing to try to settle this honorably?
entries.m_thank_negotiate: Thanks for calming them down. They were too mad to shoot straight, probably, but I might have been hurt.
entries.m_waiting: They should show up any minute, they were hot on my trail.
entries.a_greet_m: There you are! Look, we want the coordinates to that wreck! A deal's a deal!
entries.m_greet_a: After how you were talking about cutting me out of the profits? I don't think so!
entries.a_respond_m_1: It was a JOKE. We were ready to do this fair and square. You clearly aren't!
entries.a_thank_combat: Figures he'd die without telling us the coordinates. Now we're out all those credits.
entries.a_thank_negotiate: Well, we can't cut you in the deal, but thanks for the help getting the argument settled. I guess we all got a bit hot under the collar there.
entries.minion_1: How are we going to get back our money?
entries.minion_2: Mother always told me never to get involved with a smuggler.
entries.minion_3: I just want to know the coordinates to the wreck.
entries.minion_4: I'm an orphan. I have been searching long and hard for word of my family. I have high hopes that I am actually a scion of a noble and long-lived line of great nobility, left abandoned by my parents under persecution. I believe that this wreck is the place to find the hidden secrets of my birth, and so I fell in with this motley crew.... actually, I'm just here for the money. Why are you talking to me anyway?
entries.minion_5: Let's kill him! After we get the coordinates, of course.
entries.a_greet_mad: You're helping this lying doublecrosser? Well, we can take care of you too!
entries.a_waiting: Well, what are you going to do? If you don't do something soon, I'm just going to take out this cheat here and write off the loss in credits!
entries.a_thank_negotiate_again: Thanks again for sorting this out. Once we find the wreck, I'm sure we can, uh, re-negotiate the percentages. I have leverage, if you know what I mean.
entries.a_brushoff: Get lost. We're out a ton of credits now, and it doesn't make us happy. Be glad we don't take it out of your hide.
entries.a_tired_waiting: OK, that's enough waiting. Tell us the coordinates!
entries.a_no_progress: Get lost. I don't have time to waste on you.
entries.m_saved: Well, good riddance to them. I would have died before telling them the coordinates. Besides, they never knew the wreck wasn't really worth anything--I just needed to get there to try to recover some archaelogical data. See, you have to be careful when dealing with thugs!
entries.m_betrayed: Oh no, you don't! I might have doublecrossed them, but I won't let you doublecross me!
entries.m_sorry: Well, sorry I can't offer a reward, but in point of fact the wreck is worthless. I'm an archaeologist, and I just wanted backing for this trip. I kind of tricked them into giving it.
